record.field: faqs
FAQ
FAQ's
True
/faqs
redirect
True
Who is Everything Optical?

Everything Optical are suppliers of wholesale designer eyewear based out of Toronto, Canada. We have offices across the global to cater to our international client base. Team ETO have been a trusted partner for over two decades, providing high quality branded optical frames in a wide range of styles.
Which brands does Team ETO offer?

We offer a wide range of designer brands from Carrera, Calvin Klein, Balenciaga, Dolce & Gabbana, Guess, Adidas, Hugo Boss, Dunhill, Converse, Lacoste, Moschino, New Balance, Tom Ford and many more. All available brands are available to view on our B2B portal.
How can I view pricing info?
Our prices are competitive and exclusive to our clients. Simply register on our B2B portal and await approval from our management to view pricing and inventory information.
Which countries can I get products delivered to?
Everything Optical will ship to any part of the world and provide tracking details for all orders to ensure safe and secure delivery of your eyewear.
How do I place an order?
Once you register as a customer, you can add products to your cart and make the purchase and orders will be shipped out shortly after with details on your order sent to your registered email address.
How much is the minimum order?
At Everything Optical, our clients needs come first. That is why we DO NOT HAVE a minimum order number. Simply order what is needed for you!
How can I make a return?
Visit our terms and conditions for more details on returns. You can also contact your dedicated sales manager for additional information.
How are payments made?
Invoices are credited to your account. Payment can be made multiple options. Please reach out to sales manager for additional details.
How long till my order is processed?
Orders are processed and ready to ship within 2 business days.
How are shipping chargers?
Costs for shipping are dependent on destination and quantity, it may vary from order to order.
